long_description: Open the top flap of the Osprey Nano Port shoulder bag and you can see-and use-your tablet. A clear, touch-sensitive tablet window makes staying connected while on the go easier than ever. Front flap doubles as a storage compartment for yourt tablet computer; clear window lets you use your tablet without removing it from the protection of the bag. Zippered main compartment features plenty of organizational options; zippered front pocket under flap secures small items. Adjustable shoulder strap and haul handle provide easy carry options. Osprey Nano Port shoulder bag is made of durable polyester that resists tears and stands up to daily use.
short_description: Open the top flap of the Osprey Nano Port shoulder bag and you can see-and use-your tablet. A clear, touch-sensitive tablet window makes staying connected while on the go easier than ever.
